title: The Day of Molehills and Windmills
description: Meet Stan, Patch the dog, and Little Red Tractor and read about their busy lives on Gosling farm. One foggy day, Stan discovers his meadow full of molehills. Stan likes moles as he believes they're good for the soil. Mrs Turvey doesn't want them in her garden though, so it's time to call Maurice the mole-catcher!
author: Peter Tye
